questions.question_text: "mandatory" の意味はどれでしょう？
questions.example_sentence: The company announced that the safety training is mandatory for all staff.
questions.explanation:
義務的な
任意の
新入社員限定
年1回のみ利用可能

questions.question_text: "registration" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The process of signing up for something
A meal provided during the event
questions.example_sentence: Registration for the training must be completed by June 5.
questions.explanation:
登録・申し込み
会社規定
苦情
食事提供

questions.question_text: "capacity" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The maximum number of people something can hold
questions.example_sentence: The training room has a seating capacity of 40 people.
questions.explanation:
収容人数・容量
講師
備品
評価

questions.question_text: "reschedule" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To change the time of an appointment or event
questions.example_sentence: If you cannot attend, please reschedule through the HR portal.
questions.explanation:
時間を変更する
永久にキャンセルする
返金を申請する
別の講師を割り当てる

questions.question_text: "confirmation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A message that verifies an appointment or action
questions.example_sentence: You will receive a confirmation email once your registration is complete.
questions.explanation:
確認通知・確定メール
拒否通知
財務報告書
研修冊子
